meanings.definition: A baseball player who plays in the outfield.
meanings.sent1: The outfielder caught the ball easily.
meanings.sent2: The outfielder ran swiftly to catch the fly ball.
meanings.sent3: The outfielder tripped over his own feet trying to catch the ball.
meanings.sent4: The outfielder's speed was like lightning on the field.
meanings.sent5: The outfielder's glove was as reliable as a best friend.

meanings.definition: A person who plays in the outfield in a game or sport.
meanings.sent1: The young outfielder practiced catching with his dad.
meanings.sent2: The soccer team needed an outfielder for the upcoming match.
meanings.sent3: The outfielder accidentally caught a butterfly instead of the ball.
meanings.sent4: The outfielder stood out like a bright star in the game.
meanings.sent5: The outfielder's determination shone through every play.
